once again my life expressed in song by guess who? The Patient A groan of tedium escapes me, Startling the fearful. Is this a test? It has to be, Otherwise I can't go on. Draining patience, drain vitality. This paranoid, paralyzed vampire act's a little old. But I'm still right here Giving blood, keeping faith And I'm still right here. Wait it out, Gonna wait it out, Be patient (wait it out). If there were no rewards to reap, No loving embrace to see me through This tedious path I've chosen here, I certainly would've walked away by now. Gonna wait it out. If there were no desire to heal The damaged and broken met along This tedious path I've chosen here I certainly would've walked away by now. And I still may ... (sigh) ... I still may. Be patient. I must keep reminding myself of this. And if there were no rewards to reap, No loving embrace to see me through This tedious path I've chosen here, I certainly would've walked away by now. And I still may. Gonna wait it out.

I row because I want to move my boat forward. but sometimes I will be moving into a different rhythm and I will begin to rush the slide. When I rush the slide I can take more strokes, but the boat begins to rock to the side and I get all wet. It also cancels out most of the forward movement that I have gone. I think that when i row down the river of life, I should learn to take things slowly.

Sweat I'm sweating, and breathing and staring and thinking and sinking deeper. It's almost like I'm swimming. The sun is burning hot again on the hunter and the fisherman, and he's trying to remember when, but it makes him dizzy. Seems like I've been here before. Seems so familiar. Seems like I'm slipping into a dream within a dream. Must be the way you whisper. The sun is setting cool again. I'm the thinker and the fisherman and I'm trying to remember when but it makes me dizzy. and I'm sweating, and breathing, and staring and thinking and sinking deeper and it's almost like I'm swimming. Seems like I've been here before. Seems so familiar. Seems like I'm slipping into a dream within a dream. It's the way you whisper. It drags me under and takes me home.
Man I am so conflicted.

yes, today was an interesting day. I got to school and chilled with Maria, Dustin, and Jezel. Dustin and Jazel are now dating. I talked to Daniella and she apologized for what she said. Later, when I was waiting for crew, I witnessed her and Maria having another of their now infamous cafeteria arguements. This led Maria to storm off towards the bathroom, prompting me to sprint across the lunch room to catch her just before she entered the ladies room. These little chases seem to be pretty frequent so I think I have to get used to them. I tried to figure out what was going on but, Daniella came over and the arguement ensued. Thai walked by and i gave her a confused look which she returned. Then Maria left once more and I stayed put, I stared at Daniella and she said something which I didn't hear. I left the hallway and Maria walked back in. I went over to Dustin and Jezel and learned that they were together. I ran back to tell Maria. I told her and she and Daniella told me to leave. Thats all I know about that, but I hope all is resolved. I have a regatta in 3 days yippee! I am probably gonna ERG tonight. I will post my time later.

Its almost time for bed. Another day closes in the life of Abe, even though another began already. Didn't do much today, went to church twice, Mass and 8th grade graduation. I have spent 2 days virtually cut off from my friends, well besides AIM. It has given me time to think. The warzone of my emotions is starting to settle. It is turning into more of a struggle between what can be now and what can be in the future. At current moment I have feelings for 3 girls. All are of the same type amazingly, but they have three distinct personalities. Ms. White is starting to fade from view. Ms. Red has grown greatly in the last week or so. And Ms. Purple has held steady as she has for a long while. Ms. White is starting to express similar tendencies to what I experienced about two months ago. After recieving confirmation of this I examined the evidence and the inability of our romantic outlooks and made the strategic decision not to pursue Ms. White any further. She also seems to be going back to where she came from, just not reverting back to the same state. Ms. Red on the other hand has started to catch my eye. After spending a good amount of time with her, it appears that I have taken a liking to her. I would pursue this path further were it not for one reason, Ms. Purple. Ms. Red and Ms. Purple are associated in a way that if I were to go after either of the two colors, my plight with the other would be squashed indefinitely. Seeing as I have been an admirerer of Ms. Purple for quite a while, it makes sense to want to safeguard that (Potential) relationship. So then why not go after Ms. Purple? FEAR. I have no idea how to even start the process of trying to woo Ms. Purple. It took me more than a fortnight to work up the nerve to broach the subject with her. And just that delimma brought upon me the rails of my peers. "Playing with fire" I believe were the words of one undocumented young chap. Also if I do plunge into this spectrum, I have to deal with the legends of my past. I have respect for whatever constraints a lady places upon her physical person, but sadly that may not be the preconcieved belief. Here I will leave to you my questions. Your opinions are valued greatly. 1) As Ms. White fades into oblivion, do I have the right to comment on her romantic interests as a friend? 2) Has enough time lapsed between my relationship with Ms. White to begin pursuing other options? 3) Is any potential relationship with Ms. Purple enough reason to not pursue Ms. Red? 4) If I am to bar myself Ms. Red, does that mean I should work up the balls to go after Ms. Purple. 5) Is sitting back and doing nothing a good idea? Please answer these questions by clicking on the comments button under this post. Or if you would like to keep your response private E-Mail me at xomiax@yahoo.com. Thanx

OK. After some deliberation, I have decided to take the plunge and go after purple. Now I did hear your comments on this, and I know none of you advocated this move. But I would like to repond by saying: "Fuck That". now I know it has been mentioned that I may become angry because of the lack of "stuff". I don't think this will be a problem. First I have to actually court her and get her to like me. That will be my main problem. Then I can proceed from there. Also you guys know that i am not gonna force a girl to do anything she does not wanna do. Another thing is that i really like Purple, I could never do anything to her. Also purple gave me the advice to abstain from dating anyone for a month, which will be completed on Tuesday. Now here are some major hurdles I have to overcome: Firstly, I know that I like her alot, but sadly you can't have a successful one-way relationship. I need to figure out whether she likes me or not, or if she would go for me. I plan to run some probes on this later in the week. Secondly, we do not live near each other. I would have to hang out with her in the city. This would require her to take the train in or her parents to drop her off. I do not know whether or not she or they would be willing to do this. Of course I would be willing to go there, but I do not know how to get there. I am getting a car in early August, which would make things much more easy, but that does not help me now. Thirdly, and most importantly, I have to deal with my crappy reputation. Now I know Purple is not one to just believe whatever she hears, but she also has common sense. She knows that most people believe that "Birds of a Feather flock together". Even though I may have made a few mistakes, I was going through something, and I know that I made some decisions that were not the best option at the time. The difference now is that I have learned from those mistakes. The spreading of false rumors should not be a problem because school is out and there is no one to propogate lies. So as I head off in this direction, i sincerely hope that I will do what is best. I will make as few mistakes as possible. I certainly hope this turns out for the best. Comments would be appricated.

The eleventh installment from The Rock Thrower: Sitting and thinking aloud These feelings no longer am I able to shroud So listen. Please won't you listen. Aching and wasting the day It must be good to be so far a way You know it. Oh God you know it. Its been so long since we were there, Time helps you drift away from me, Can you speed it up? Its been so long since I beared my soul, Tell me you have something to say to me, Or do you care at all? Ranting and showing my mind You thinking you had been left behind Hear me. Why don't you hear me? You tell me to give you time How long do I have to wait on the line? I'm Waiting. So tired of waiting. Its been so long, since we talked at all, How can you think without talking to me, Or will you think at all? It's been so long so decide my fate, I'm drowning here pull me up to breathe, Or just let me fall.
